infos.value: I don't know. A sudden chill just came over me...
Hmph. You're not losing your nerve, are you?
I would be glad if it were just nerves...
Ramada, would you read the stars for me?
The moon and stars are divided by a malicious intent, one that will call forth a radiance of destruction upon these lands.
What is that supposed to mean?
I cannot say for certain, my lord.
I merely relay what the stars whisper to me.
Sterne... Mother... I hope you're safe, wherever you are.
